description.en:
The direct sequel to Rose of Versailles.

It tells the story of Napoleon's empire, including the Thermidorian Reaction, the Italian Campaign, the Syrian Campaign, the Battle of the Nile and the coup of 18 Brumaire, and the French invasion of Russia.

In a world where the Han Empire never fell, martial arts is a power used to squeeze the people dry. So when a new continent is discovered, both good and evil men alike flee to settle there and escape the tyranny of the Emperor, opening up the era of a Martial Wild West.

In the turbulent frontier, Zhang Qian is a man that reincarnated from our cushy, modern world, but his new world is nothing like the fantastical world he dreamed about from reading martial arts novels. While the martial arts in his new world are powerful, they are also too crude and lack elegance. And so Qian journeys the new continent for his dream of bringing true martial arts back to the new martial realm.
description.pt-br: Em um mundo que o Império Han nunca caiu, artes marciais são um poder usado para oprimir as pessoas. Então quando um novo continente é descoberto, tanto os bons quanto os maus fogem para se estabelecer e fugir da tirania do Imperador, dando início a era do Oeste Selvagem Marcial. Na turbulenta fronteira, Zhang Qian é um homem que reencarnou do nosso mundo moderno e confortável, mas seu novo ambiente não é nada como o mundo fantasioso com o qual ele sonhava ao ler novels de artes marciais. Enquanto as artes marciais em seu novo mundo são poderosas, elas também são grosseiras demais e não tem elegância. E assim Qian começa sua jornada pelo continente pelo sonho de trazer as artes marciais de verdade para o novo reino marcial.

description.en:
Busan, 1936. Yeon Jeong lives her life without fitting in anywhere, until she meets a mermaid by fate. The mermaid tells her that she has come to pick her up as promised, and asks her to follow her to the place where eternal happiness lies.  
  
"Can I be happy there at last, living as myself?

Power struggles, dark struggles, and betrayal in Hell 58, the island of the Yak-Kang-sik.  
Can the protagonist common people find hope and escape from this hellish island?  
  
 [Official Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/hell-58/list?title_no=1553&page=1)

Im Dajun is a high school student who gets bullied at school every day. He came across an interview on TV just when he was on the verge of giving up on life. It was with a murderer who killed the classmates that bullied him. Dajun becomes inspired by what he saw and decides to take revenge as well.

His revenge was successful. However, his life steered into an undesired direction. Im Dajun, leaving school, ends up joining a strange Runaway Fam.

The young runaway, Im Dajun, no longer suffers from the bullies at his school. Instead, he now must survive against even more vicious thugs on the streets.

---

description.ko:
고등학생 임다준은 학교에서 늘상 괴롭힘을 당하는 게 일상이었다. 삶을 포기하기 직전 우연히 본 티비 속 동급생 살해범의 인터뷰에 감명을 받고 복수를 결심하게 된다.
복수는 성공했지만 삶은 원치않는 방향으로 흘러가게 되고.. 학교에서 나온 임다준은 범상치않은 가출팸에 들어가게 된다.
가출청소년 임다준은 더이상 학교 안 일진들에게 시달리지 않게 되었지만 그보다 잔혹한 길거리의 양아치들을 상대로 살아남아야만 한다.

삶의 끝자락에 내몰린 고등학생 임다준의 길거리 생존기!

---

description.zh:
懦弱少年复仇后无家可归，
残酷的街头生存挑战开始！
男主任多骏经常被欺负。在他想要寻短见的那一刻，偶然看到电视里的一段采访，感触颇深，决定报仇。而后虽然复仇成功，但他的人生却也朝着无法预测的方向发展。被父亲赶出家门的他开始街头流浪，必须要面对更残酷的街头混混生活。被逼上绝路的他能否生存下来呢？

---

description.zh-hk:
高中生林多俊每天在學校遭受以李道允為首的不良學生們的霸凌，在他想結束自己的生命以解脫的前一晚，偶然在電視上看到殺害多名霸凌者的高中生的訪問，而萌生報仇的念頭。某次又受到李道允的霸凌時，他將道允推向衝來的貨車。在看似成功的復仇之後，席捲而來的是....？

title.en: The Chaotic God of Extraordinary Strength

description.en:
Zheng, the ‘Slaughtering Scythe Ghost’ who finds pleasure in killing.

He happens to have the exact same face as the Third Young Master of the Great Orderly Wooden Sword Hall, Mok Gyung-Woon…
“Become my body double. That way, I’ll let you out of this prison.”

“Will you give me that opportunity?”
‘Crack-!!!’
He kills the Third Young Master and decides to become the ‘real’ one. Can the fake Mok Gyung-Woon survive as the real one? The serial killer begins his new life as the Third Young Master of the Great Orderly Wooden Sword Hall.

The so-called “Lighthouse of the North,” the prosperous trading town of Schoarra, hides a dark underbelly: seedy slums ruled by five ruthless crime bosses.

When streetwise orphan Vlad finds the brothel he works for decimated by a disgraced knight, he turns to the path of the blade, pledging himself to the pursuit of power by sword. 

Blessed with the ability to seek wisdom from his sentient sword, Vlad embarks upon a journey of growth and peril as swordsman in service to the powerful House Vayezid.

description.en: After his traumatic years in junior high school, the ultra-introvert Shizuki Keisuke decides to turn his life around, and gives himself a complete make-over for his high school "debut." His new high school life seems promising, as no one is aware of his hidden past...except for one person: Kusunoki Shizuka, who also changed herself in pursuit of a more successful high school life! As their fates intertwine, will Keisuke ultimately be able live a peaceful life in high school...?!
description.ja:
中学時代のトラウマをきっかけに高校デビューに成功した元陰キャの志月恵助。
新しい環境で過去の自分を知る者はいない。ただ一人、同じ中学出身で
恵助と同様に高校デビューを果たした女子・楠木静を除いて…。

---
Chūgaku jidai no torauma o kikkake ni kōkō debyū ni seikō shita moto in kya no shitsuki keisuke. Atarashī kankyō de kako no jibun o shiru mono wa inai. Tadahitori, onaji chūgaku shusshin de keisuke to dōyō ni kōkō debyū o hatashita joshi Kusunoki Shizuka o nozoite….

description.en: A peek into the "everyday nudity" of high school girls. Virgins’ Empire is a look into the lives of seven high school girls attending an all girls school. We follow them as they grow relationships with one another. Some more intimate than others.

altTitles.it: Hitomi-chan è timida con gli sconosciuti

description.en: One day, the ordinary 2nd year high schooler Yuu Usami accidentally encounters a big girl with a scary look. Turns out she's glaring at him, but why…?! Although Hitomi Takano looks like she's scary and awkward, she's actually a kind and adorable girl. This one shall be a happy, heartwarming slice-of-life comedy.
description.es:
Un día, el estudiante de 2do año Yuu Yusami se encuentra por accidente con una muchacha grande con una mirada temeraria. Resulta que ella símplemente lo está observando… pero ¿por qué? A pesar de que Hitomi Takano se ve espeluznante y huraña, ella en realidad es querida y adorable. Ésta será una feliz y grata comedia de la vida cotidiana.  
  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Mangaka’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/910858)  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/cyorisukenosuke)
description.fr: Un jour, Yuu Usami – lycéen ordinaire en deuxième année – rencontre une grande fille avec un regard effrayant. Elle a l’air de le fusiller du regard, mais pourquoi…?! Pourtant, même si Hitomi Takano fait peur et est maladroite, elle est en réalité une fille gentille et adorable. Bienvenue dans une comédie/tranche de vie qui va vous réchauffer le cœur !
description.ja:
どこにでもいる平凡な高校2年生の宇佐見君は、ある日、偶然に居合わせた"何やら目つきが悪くていろいろとおっきな女の子"に、なぜか睨みつけられてしまい…!?
見た目は怖くて不器用だけど、実は優しくて可愛い三白眼女子の、楽しくてハートフルな日常コメディ…開幕!!
description.ru: Однажды обыкновенный старшеклассник 2-го года Юу Усами случайно встречает большую девушку со страшным взглядом. По какой-то причине она не отрывает от него глаз, но он ведь ей ничего не делал!.. Хотя Хитоми Такано выглядит страшной и неприветливой, на самом деле она добрая и очаровательная девушка.
description.pt-br: Em um dia comum, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, chamado Usami Yuu, se encontra acidentalmente com Takano Hitomi, uma garota alta e que tem um olhar assustador. Acontece que ela está olhando diretamente para ele. Mas embora Hitomi pareça assustadora e desajeitada, na verdade ela é uma garota gentil e adorável que simplesmente quer se tornar mais sociável.

description.en: Because of mysterious human-eating creatures named “Arnis”, humanity has gone near extinct. In order to meet his close friend Nika, a 16 years old boy Evan enlists himself in platoon Able, an army that has obtained supernatural abilities with the materials they gained from Arnis. And the world, which to some is the past, some is the future, some is the present, starts to move.

One Step to Being Dark Lord
One Step to the Demon King
One Step for the Dark Lord

description.en:
This is no different from ordinary villager life...
"There can be no one stronger than me in this world!"
To become the strongest, Yuria, the Sea Queen, went ashore in search of the Demon King. But when she looked at her reflection, she saw the face of a child. In exchange for her legs, she lost all her strength... Even so, still striving to become the strongest, Yuria begins a painful journey!

---

description.id:
[ "Hanya saja... aku jadi tidak ada bedanya dengan penduduk desa..." ] "Tidak boleh ada makhluk yang lebih kuat dariku di dunia ini!" Untuk menjadi yang terkuat, Yuria, Raja Lautan, datang ke daratan untuk mencari Raja Iblis terkuat. Namun, saat melihat ke cermin, dia melihat wajah anak kecil...? Sebagai ganti kaki, dia telah kehilangan seluruh kekuatannya. Meskipun begitu, ia masih mengincar posisi teratas di dunia! Perjalanannya yang penuh air mata dimulai!

["이건 그냥… 마을 사람 A랑 다를게 없잖아…"]

"나보다 강한 존재는 이 세계에 있을 수 없어!"
세계관 최강자 자리를 위해 지상최강 "마왕"을 찾아
뭍으로 나온 바다의 왕 "유리아" 

그런데… 거울을 보니 웬 어린아이가…?
다리를 얻음과 동시에 
그녀의 모든 힘이 사라져 버렸다...

그럼에도 여전히 세계최강 자리를 노리고 있는
 그녀의 눈물겨운 여정이 시작된다!!

description.ru:
Это… Ничем не отличается от деревенской жизни... В этом мире не может быть существа сильнее меня!” Чтобы стать сильнейшей, Юрия, Морская Королева, вышла на сушу в поисках Короля Демонов. Но… Посмотрев на свое отражение, она увидела лицо ребенка... В обмен на ноги она потеряла все свои силы... Даже так, все еще стремясь стать сильнейшей, начинается мучительное путешествие Юрии!

---

description.zh:
深海女王无奈变成小孩？
落魄海王的陆地称霸之旅！
大海之王友丽亚为了称霸天下，特地上岸来到陆地上寻找魔王一决胜负。可上岸后才发现，自己失去了所有的力量，而且还变成了小孩子？为了称霸天下，友丽亚辛酸的崭新旅程就此拉开帷幕！

---

description.en: Teenage magician Kaito Kuroba has a secret identity: that of Kaitou Kid, a famous internationally-known and wanted "phantom thief". Kaito took the identity after one day discovering that his late father was the original Kaitou Kid. Later on, he discovers his father, who died from an 'accident' during a magic trick, was really murdered because he would not steal the jewel Pandora for an evil organization. As Kaitou Kid, Kaito tries to find Pandora before that organization that killed his father do, and destroy it, leading Inspector Nakamori and his taskforce on the wildest jewel heists imaginable!
description.ja: 世紀の宝物を予告通りに手中し、闇から闇へと消え去る紳士・怪盗キッド！！見事なマジックで名刑事らの裏をかき、目指すは「正義」の完全犯罪！！今宵、神出鬼没の彼が狙う宝石は、時価4億円の「月の瞳」だ！！

description.de:
Damals hatte Dokja noch überhaupt keine Ahnung. Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. Jetzt begibt sich Dokja auf eine Reise, um den Lauf der Geschichte zu ändern und die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

description.ja:
「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

description.en:
Keima Katsuragi is a high school student better known online as the "God of Conquest," the man who can obtain the heart of any dating sim girl. In his opinion, real life is an awful game; three-dimensional girls are annoying and false representations of how a real girl should be.  
  
One afternoon, while taking a break from cleaning duty, he stumbles across a strange message that goads him to conquer a girl. On a whim, he accepts, and his consent summons a girl named Elucia "Elsie" de Lute Ima, a denizen of hell tasked with capturing runaway spirits that have festered in girls' hearts. Keima is shocked and tries to escape, but Elsie tells him that failure in fulfilling the newly-formed contract will result in the termination of his life!   
  
Tasked with capturing the runaway spirits, Keima uses his expertise and knowledge of dating sims to obtain the hearts of girls in real life.

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **The World God Only Knows** (2012)
description.pl: Czy nieuleczalny otaku może być idealnym facetem? Dowód na to, że wbrew pozorom manga opierająca się na haremie może być oryginalna.
description.ru:
Кацураги Кейма – мастер обольщения, который знает сотни приемов, как влюбить в себя девушку, с легкостью предугадывает каждый её шаг и называет себя Богом-Обольстителем.   
А ведь именно такого ищут… в аду, откуда сбежало множество душ, что закрадываются в сердца невинных девушек и преспокойно там живут. И по мнению здешнего руководства, Кацураги и есть тот единственный, кто может покорить сердце жертвы, освободив от сбежавшей души, а посему заключают с ним договор.   
Но они просчитались в одном - Кацураги обожает виртуальных девушек, а живых, настоящих, считает мусором, не достойных его божественного внимания. Однако ему придется что-то срочно придумать, иначе он лишится головы.
description.pt-br: Katsuragi Keima é conhecido como o Deus da Conquista nos jogos de namoro 2D, Um dia ele recebe um contrato em forma de e-mail do chefe dos demônios desafiando ele a conquistar um certo tipo de garota, pensando ele ser um desafio de mais outro jogo ele aceita o contrato, e a partir dai com a ajuda (ou não) de Elsie, ele é forçado a conquistar garotas reais para não perder a cabeça, que é o que acontece se ele quebrar o contrato. description.ko:
After experiencing multiple diastrophisms, the Earth’s sea level rose exponentially. 
Hoju wants to show his daughter, Han Byoel, the world and heads toward his hometown. There are multiple strange marks in the town he hasn't visited for 20 years… Will the two be able to survive safely?

title.en: Destroy It All And Love Me In Hell!

altTitles.ja: ぜんぶ壊して地獄で愛して

description.en:
Kurumi Yoshizawa, the student council president, has excellent grades and an inviting, friendly personality… on the surface at least. In reality, her days are spent struggling against her domineering mother and agonizing over her teachers’ expectations.

One day, Kurumi reluctantly goes to meet Naoi, her truant classmate, at her homeroom teacher’s request to look after her. The situation sours quickly as Naoi sees through Kurumi’s facade and makes her animosity clear. On the verge of a meltdown, Kurumi is barely able to stop herself from shoplifting, unaware that she’s being recorded by Naoi…

This is a violent story about two young girls struggling every day with no escape.
description.pl:
Kurumi Yoshizawa, przewodnicząca samorządu uczniowskiego, otwarta, ambitna, życzliwa... a przynajmniej na taką się kreuje. Rzeczywistość wygląda jednak mniej rózowo - w szkole musi zmagać się z nadmiernymi oczekiwaniami nauczycieli, a w domu czeka na nią toksyczna matka.

Pewnego dnia Kurumi, na prośbę wychowawcy, udaje się do Naoi, swojej wagarującej koleżanki z klasy. Sprawy przybierają zupełnie niespodziewany obrót, gdy Naoi dostrzega fasadę Kurumi i jasno wyraża swoją wrogość wobec niej. Będąc na skraju załamania nerwowego, Kurumi powstanawia dokonać drobnej kradzieży, przed czym w ostatniej chwili się powstrzymuje. Nie ma pojęcia, że całe te zajście nagrała Naoi.

To brutalna opowieść o dwóch młodych dziewczynach, które każdego dnia zmagają się z codziennością, od której nie mogą się wyrwać.
description.uk:
Вітайте, Йошізава Курумі – відмінниця, розумниця, красуня, президент школи та просто дуже гарна дівчинка!.. Принаймні такою вона себе показує людям. Реальність прозаїчніша: жорстокі методи виховання матері, відсутність будь-якого вільного часу, море стресу та щира відраза до всіх навколо.
І як часто буває з такими «відмінницями» – накипіло. «Що, якщо я це вкраду? Мене спіймають? Може, тоді цей жах нарешті скінчиться?» – стоїть і думає Курумі, не усвідомлюючи, що її спроба крадіжки записується на відео. Проте її знімають не камери відеоспостереження крамниці, а телефон Наой.
Наой – це дівчина, яка за словами не слідкує, до школи не ходить та обожнює ставити «відмінниць» на місце. Вона бачить абсолютно все крізь маску Курумі, погрожуючи показати відео однокласникам. Для Наой це був хіба що спосіб розвіяти нудьгу та провчити лицемірку… Допоки вона не починає бачити в Курумі лиш одне, але чисте та справжнє спільне бажання.

altTitles.zh-hk: 發小的異常可愛的妹妹

description.en:
Yanagi, a second-year high school student, has a faint crush on Mizuki, the younger sister of her childhood friend Momo.

One day, while rummaging through Mizuki's personal belongings in her room, Yanagi discovers the truth about Mizuki...?

Jang Suchan is an extraordinary college student at the top of the social food chain. But underneath the perfect façade, he hides a pair of insect wings that suddenly grew when he used a mysterious bug spray called "Jungle Juice.” Suchan's life crumbles when he bares his wings to the world to save someone's life. When all hope seems lost, Suchan stumbles upon a hidden world of insect humans where everyone is accepted for what they are.

But the law of the jungle governs this secret society and all must fend for themselves in order to survive.
description.fr:
Le mystérieux insecticide "Jungle Juice" a fait de lui un humain insecte.  
Jang Su-chan, un étudiant qui cachait ses dents, a un jour ressemblé à cela.  
Vous serez vu par tout le monde, et vous serez dans le monde des insectes.  
Vous vous battrez contre la logique du faible…  
  
Action/ Fantaisie de divers pouvoirs d'insectes  
Le nouveau héros de Super String Universe fait son apparition !
description.pt-br: Jang Suchan é um aluno universitário no topo de sua cadeia social. Mas, debaixo da faixada perfeita, ele esconde um par de asas de inseto que cresceram de repente após usar um inseticida misterioso chamado “Jungle Juice”. A vida de Suchan desmorona quando ele exibe suas asas ao mundo afim salvar a vida de outra pessoa. Quando toda a esperança parece perdida, Suchan se depara com um mundo escondido de insetos humanos onde todos são aceitos por quem são. Mas a lei da selva governa essa sociedade secreta e todos devem lutar para sobreviverem.

description.en:
I can't believe my ojou-sama is so huge!  
  
Fujido Oriko is the buxom young head of the Fujido Zaibatsu, a group that has a monopoly on Japan's vending machine industry. And serving at her side is her personal butler, the eccentric Dr. Sebastion.  
  
When a monster suddenly attacks the city, Dr. Sebastion slips his ojou-sama an experimental energy drink his team in R&D has been developing. As a result, she quickly finds herself growing into a giantess, matching the attacking kaiju in size! Will she be able to stop his rampage, or at the very least, keep her dignity intact?  
  
*[The pre-serialization version was the winner of Shounen Jump's Dec 2020 Bronze Rookie Award. The current serialization is on Sunday Web Every.]*

title.en: A Dance of Swords in the Night

altTitles.en: In the Night Consumed by Blades, I Walk
Sword Fanatic Wanders Through the Night

description.en:
The Mystic Lunar Dance Troupe took in Jin Sohan as an orphan, and he spent his childhood with them. But one day, one of the four great demons, the Venom Demon, discovered that he was special and kidnapped him. After all kinds of tests, he decided to raise him as his disciple. Ten years later, Jin Sohan tried to look for traces of the Mystic Lunar Dance Troupe, but the Sword Dance Troupe had already been destroyed at the hands of the Unorthodox Faction that’s now ruling over his hometown.

---
Kidnapped as a child to be trained in the art of poison, Sohan Jin returns to his hometown in search of the group of New Moon Sword Dancers who raised him. However, upon his return, Sohan discovers the sword dancers have been defeated by a nefarious sect that now rules the area, with some members having been abducted. What would have been a heartwarming reunion transforms into a quest for revenge as Sohan begins his search for the remaining sword dancers, and he’s willing to poison anyone who gets in his way.

---
**Original Novel:** [Chapters](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5612093), [Volumes](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5612161)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8530460), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=795542)

description.ja:
天涯孤独だった陳蘇霞は、玄月剣舞団に拾われ、そこで子ども時代を過ごす。 しかしある日、彼の特殊な身体能力に気づいた四大悪人の一人、毒魔に連れさられ様々な人体実験のモルモットになる。 その後、毒魔の弟子となった陳蘇霞は、10年後…玄月剣舞団の行方を捜そうとしたが、剣舞団はすでに故郷を制圧していた黒道たちによって壊滅されていて…

---
**Original Novel:** [Chapters](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5612093), [Volumes](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5612161)

description.ko:
진소한은 본디 고아 출신이었으나, 
현월검무단이 거두어 그녀들과 어린 시절을 함께 보낸다.  
하지만 어느 날 그의 특수한 신체 특성을 알아본 사대악인 중 하나인 독마에게 납치당하고, 
온갖 실험 끝에 결국 제자로까지 키워지게 된다. 
10년 뒤, 그는 현월검무단의 흔적을 찾아보려 하지만, 
검무단은 이미 고향을 지배하는 흑도들의 손에 사라져 버렸는데!

---
**Original Novel:** [Chapters](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5612093), [Volumes](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5612161)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8530460), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=795542)

description.zh:
《狂魔重生》编剧新作！
恶人之徒出山惩治黑道！
陈少寒原本是孤儿出身，但被弦月剑舞班收留，在弦月剑舞班度过了美好的童年。可是有一天，四大恶人之一毒魔将陈少寒绑架，并将其培养成了弟子。十年后，陈少寒回到故乡，试图寻找弦月剑舞班的痕迹，但剑舞班早已消失在了黑道手中!

---

title.en: Akuyaku Onzoushi no Kanchigai Seija Seikatsu - Nidome no Jinsei wa Yaritai Houdai Shitai Dake na no ni

altTitles.ja: 悪役御曹司の勘違い聖者生活～二度目の人生はやりたい放題したいだけなのに～

altTitles.ja-ro: Akuyaku Onzoushi no Kanchigai Seija Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: 悪役御曹司の勘違い聖者生活

altTitles.en: The Misunderstood Saintly Life of a Villainous Scion ~ I just want to do whatever I want in my second life~

description.en:
Intending to Live a Carefree Life as a Villainous Heir, But Inadvertently Declared a Saint!?

"My path to domination starts here!"

Ouga Vellet, the eldest son of the infamous corrupt lordly Vellet family, is a reincarnated individual. Having been taken advantage of due to his kindness in his past life, he now revels in the life of a mischievous villainous heir. From then on, Ouga spared no compromise, pushing the limits of "tyranny" to achieve his ambitions.

He wanted power. He decided to deceive the expelled female knight captain and recruit her as a pawn. He desired a harem. He believed that by helping the oppressed commoner girls, they would readily accept him. He even saw potential in operating within the underworld. His plan was to start by squeezing the bad guys. Connections were also crucial. He aimed to excel in the Magic Academy. Thus, he envisioned his days as a carefree ruler (+effort) under the authority of his family... But things took an unexpected turn.

"Wow, Ouga-sama, you're amazing!"

...Just for "arrogant behavior," why does his reputation keep soaring without his control?

However, Ouga remains unaware. He doesn't yet know that this evaluation will become something beyond his own management. Where will the misunderstanding lead? A self-declared saint due to a misunderstanding about being a villainous heir? The curtain rises on a life of misconceptions and misconceived saintliness!

altTitles.en: I’ll be Taking a Break for Personal Reasons

description.en:
My name is Yu Il-shin, and I'm a shitty, third-rate novelist.
My name might be "Only God" in Korean, but don't actually pray to me. It's just a name.

This one random day, I finally get my wish of awakening... but my ability is kind of strange.

I'm able to connect to a small world through my smartphone, where the weak ants there worship me as god!

title.ja: Genkai Level 1 kara no Nariagari ~Saijaku Level no Ore ga Isekai Saikyou ni Naru made

altTitles.ja: 限界レベル１からの成り上がり　～最弱レベルの俺が異世界最強になるまで～

altTitles.en: I’m Capped at Level 1?! Thus Begins My Journey to Become the World’s Strongest Badass!
The Rise from Max Level 1: How I, the Lowest Level, Became the Strongest in Another World

altTitles.zh: 从极限水平1开始的上升~最弱水平的我成为异世界最强~

altTitles.zh-hk: 從極限水平1開始的上升~最弱水平的我成為異世界最強~

altTitles.ko: 한계 레벨 1부터 성공담 ~최약 레벨인 내가 이세계 최강이 되기까지~

altTitles.ru: Предельный уровень от выскочки: Самый слабый до сегодняшнего дня

altTitles.en: Rise from Limiting Level 1: How I, the Lowest Level, Became the Strongest in Another World

altTitles.ja-ro: Genkai Level 1 kara no Nariagari ~Saijaku Level no Ore ga Isekai Saikyou ni Naru made

description.en: Tetsuya Takahashi was suddenly summoned to another world. However, his invocation was a mistake and after participating in the level review…he has the weakest [level limit], lv.1, the king seeing his limit calls him "defective" and condemns him to death! Despite being summoned against his will. Tetsuya is thrown into the valley of the monsters. There he was attacked and brought to the brink of death, and when he used his unique skill [Absorb Corpse], he gained the skills that the corpse possessed! "…Let's do it! Survive in this world, become strong and take revenge on those who were summoned. The "level 1" man who was called "defective" and "weak"… now begins the ascent to be the strongest!

Baphomet is the ruthless, dispassionate lord of the Abyssal Tower, a mysterious, monster-filled dungeon plaguing the human world. Many Hunters seek to defeat him and bring the tower down to no avail. Despite his demonic power, Baphomet grows curious about humanity. One day, Baphomet is defeated by Raven, the strongest Hunter, and realizes that his true wish is to be just like the humans he previously looked down on. In death, he is granted his wish, as he awakens as a human – without his powers!
description.fr:
Baphomet, le boss de la , attend un chasseur fort capable de se battre à armes égales contre lui.

Lorsqu’il s’est lassé de ces combats répétitifs, il a commencé à s’intéresser au monde de l’humanité grâce aux trophées qu’il avait obtenus des chasseurs morts.

Dans le même temps, il fut de plus en plus fasciné par l’existence des humains lorsque le puissant chasseur dont il avait toujours rêvé apparut devant lui.

Finalement, Baphomet essaie de devenir lui-même un humain…

description.en: The manga is a re-imagining of the famous Chinese classic Journey to the West story, and centers on the Buddhist priest Genjō and his journey to India as he is accompanied by three beautiful and charming women: Son Gokū, Cho Hakkai, and Sha Gojyo.
description.ja:
真の救済が記されてるという経典を得るため、孫悟空・猪八戒・沙悟浄を共にし、天竺を目指す三蔵法師。

その道のりで襲いかかる試練が
・・・・・・・・全部エロい。

仏の道に生きる三蔵にとっては貞操を失うこと、それ即ち死。果たして三蔵法師は煩悩に打ち克ち、貞操を守り抜けるのか？

altTitles.fa: من یک قطعه درجه اسطوره ای بدست آوردم

description.en:
In a world where technology and magic are almost indistinguishable from one another, monsters and creatures of myth and legend reign terror upon mankind. In humanity’s darkest moment, individuals with special god-like powers emerge to save the day. They are — the Awakened.

Meet Jaehyeon, a feeble Awakened human Raider, who struggles to make ends meet until one day a series of confounding events allow him to claim a powerful item that will change the course of history forever…
description.ko:
D급 무투계 레이더,
최강의 귀속 아이템으로
세계를 구할 신의 대적자가 되다!
description.ru: Я получил единственный в мире мифический предмет. Но что? Этот предмет принадлежит мне?

description.en:
Yuan Jing accidentally had his soul scattered during a lightning trial. With no other choice but to search for it, he enters the mortal world without any spiritual power in hopes of rebuilding his scattered soul....

Unexpectedly, his senior had secretly followed him, and his ice-covered heart gradually began to beat faster for him. "No matter where you are, I will hold you in my arms again."

Jake, a seemingly average office worker, unexpectedly finds himself thrust into a fantasy world teeming with dangers and opportunities. Rather than succumbing to fear, Jake thrives in this unfamiliar realm. As he navigates the expansive multiverse, his power grows and he transforms—evolving from a mundane office worker into a true apex hunter.

Josh, who is unemployed, takes home on a whim a bundle of answer sheets he sees at a found object collection center. He meets a girl, Mika Nagasaki, who is looking for the bundle, and through his involvement with her and the people around her, he comes face to face with the love he himself is dragged into.

---
Note: Includes an oneshot called Neko Sagashi.

After being put on trial, the deity once known as The Divine Twilight is offered a job by Thanatos, king of the underworld! Now, the fallen deity is back on Earth as his former self, Lee Changsun, and is tasked with sealing those trying to invade from beyond. With the promise of a fresh start, Changsun is gathering the gear and skills needed to get the job done, but he's feeling some watchful eyes on him...

Will this Divine Twilight see a new day, or is the sun setting on his second chance?
description.ko:
한낱 인간에서 신의 위치까지 오른 '신들의 황혼'
흉신으로 위명을 떨치다 신좌, 신앙, 신위…… 모든 걸 잃었다.
신성도 끊어졌고, 신력도 사라졌다.

“짐과 같이 일을 좀 해 주었으면 한다.”

그런 그에게 명계의 주인, 타나토스가 손을 내미는데……
그 손을 잡은 '신들의 황혼'은 이제 플레이어 '이창선'으로 다시 살기 시작한다.
자신을 나락으로 떨어트린 신들의 목을 쥐기 위해!

‘돌아왔구나, 정말로.’

altTitles.en: Reincarnation of the Murim Clan’s Former Ranker

description.en:
Legendary SSS-rank hunter Kang Tae-ha finally met his end. But just as he prepares to enter eternal sleep, he awakens once more in… imperial China?!

Now, he must live as Liu Xinyun, the delinquent heir to a powerful company. All he wants to do is put his hunting days behind him, but in order to survive his new power-hungry relatives, Xinyun must hone his skills again, starting from level one.

Can his own unique blend of necromancy and martial arts take him from useless bum to ultimate boss?
description.ko:
sss급 헌터 강태하
치열한 싸움 끝에 결국 죽음을 맞이했다.
그런데...
"이 돼지가 나라고?"
눈을 떠보니 무림이었고, 백운표국의 망나니 유신운이 되어있었다.
혼란스러운 죽음의 위기 속에!
"니들이 아직 내가 누군지 모르는구나?"
무림루저가 최강 사령술사로 다시 태어났다.
과연 유신운은 반대세력을 물리치고 백운표국의 국주자리를 차지할 수 있을 것인가!
description.ru:
Кан Тэ Ха, охотник SSS-ранга, в одиночку бросает вызов сильнейшей Гильдии "Грифон", но погибает после ожесточенного сражения! Однако…

—…Я стал свиньей?

Это мир Мурима? Теперь я – Ю Шин Ун, старший наследник клана Пэк Ун. Ситуация не из простых и отдыхать некогда, ведь за спиной уже строят козни!

—Неужели вы всё ещё не понимаете, кто я?

Некромантия из прошлой жизни. Боевые искусства из нынешней. Ему подвластно всё! Кажется, этот мир ждут новые потрясения!

description.en:
Suzuki-kun and Takagi-san — two high-schoolers who found each other in a time loop on August 31. The two are the only ones who keep their memories when it loops. As for the cause of the time loop, one thing comes to mind — Suzuki-kun's lingering regrets for the summer, a guy's greatest ambition....

It's a time loop comedy of youth, romance, and facing love head-on!
description.ja:
何度も繰り返す8月31日の中で出会った高校生の二人・鈴木くんと高木さん。

記憶を繰り越せるのは二人だけ。

タイムループの原因として考えられるのは、鈴木くんが夏休みにやり残した、男子最大の目標…。

恋と真っ向から対峙する、青春タイムループコメディ！
description.ru:
31 августа повторяется снова и снова. Сохранить об этом воспоминания могут только два школьника – Сузуки-кун и Такаги-сан. Задумавшись о причине возникновения такой временной петли, Сузуки-кун пришёл к выводу, что всё дело в нём: его незавершённых делах летом и большом сожалении на этот счёт. Чтобы выбраться из временной тюрьмы подросток решает действовать…
Вас ждёт любовная комедия противостояния любви и временной петли!
description.vi: Thế giới bị rơi vào 1 vòng lặp thời gian, chỉ có 2 người giữ lại được ký ức là Suzuki và Takagi. Nếu muốn thoát khỏi vòng lặp thì Suzuki phải hoàn thành ước nguyện còn dang dở của cậu: kiếm được bạn gái và thoát kiếp trai tân.

altTitles.ja: 月影剣帝（げつえいけんてい）

description.en:
“What a dogshit life… honestly.”

Though he had become a disciple of the Heavenly Demon amidst the strife-filled Demonic Sect,
Yeon So-Woon gets betrayed by his disciple-brother and comes to meet his end.

However…
When he woke up, he’s back to the time when he was a kid, before he got dragged into the Demonic Sect?!

Loath to repeat his hellish life in the Demonic Sect, Yeon So-Woon begins to plan for his new life.

"I’ll enact revenge on the Demonic Sect,
Become an elder of the Murim Union,
And thus, live a prosperous and respected life."

The Age of Adventures that started when the Gates opened. The Age of when everything fell apart, filled with desperation, anguish, and misery. And… The Age of when everyone gave up trying to fight back. In that Age, there was only one Explorer who fought to the very end. “You’re the only one left. The Last Explorer, Elpam.” In that moment, the Explorer’s history came to an end, as he returned to the start of the story.
4-koma about an otaku girl and her friends.

description.ar: لقد مضت ست سنوات منذ بدء اللعبة لتحديد مصير العالم. الملك البطل كانغ يو سونغ، أقوى لاعب لم يهبط من مركز هداف الدوري مرة واحدة، يرحب بالموسم الجديد أيضا. “لقد… انتهيت منذ وقت طويل. إنني أفعل ذلك فقط من أجل المال.” [مستوى التذمر قد أزداد بشكل كبير!] [يعرب شيخ اليقطين عن إرتياحه لتصرفات اللاعب!] ان طريقة النجاة للاعب الموهوب المجنون تتكشف الآن!
description.en:
[By Red-Ice Studios, creators of the series  ‘Solo Leveling and Omniscient Reader’s Viewpoint’]

It’s been six years since the game to decide the fate of the world had started. Hero-King Kang Yoo-Sung, the strongest player who hasn’t dropped from the top ranker’s position once, greets the new season, too.

“I… was finished a long fucking time ago. I’m just doing it for the money.”

[Taunt Level has drastically increased!]

[The Elder of Jesters expresses satisfaction with the actions of the contractor!]

altTitles.ja: デート・ア・パーティー

description.en:
Did you know there was an organization that is protecting the world from the harm? Its name is Ratatoskr.  
Their job is to assist "Spirits", an unknown beings that causes destruction to wherever they go, whether they intend to or not. And they help those "spirits" adjust into normal life.  
This is a story of a boy, Itsuka Shidoh, and his daily life, where he was forced into attempts into leading the spirits into his regular ordinary way of life and where they lead… his?  
  
Slice-of-life edition(?) of the popular hit series Date-A-Live, starting now!

title.en: Baby Concubine Wants to Live Quietly

altTitles.es: La concubina bebé quiere vivir tranquila

description.en:
I possessed a supporting character in a reverse harem novel.

A young concubine who, in the end, was driven to death for treason after begging for attention from the regnant empress who was the female lead, and doing wicked things to the male leads who were the concubines.

Despite everything, the fortunate thing was that I possessed her right after entering the Imperial Palace.

Even if everyone in the Imperial Palace were wary of me, they didn’t hate me yet.

‘Let’s not be impudent, and be obedient.’

I obstinately didn’t need nor have the mindset of trying to be loved by the Empress. Although the male leads who were the concubines were giving me glances, I could just lie flat.

Since it wasn’t even a very difficult thing, I really did so. It was definitely like that, but–

“Come to my bedchamber tonight. I’ll read you a fairy tale book!”

“P-please don’t cry. I’ll give you this.”

Just why is everyone’s attitude endlessly gentle? I couldn’t understand. And it was baffling.

‘…I don’t need it though?’

I wasn’t really a young kid lacking affection. And that gaze in which they looked at me as if I was the loveliest in the world was extremely uncomfortable.

Just where would I use a fairy tale book that’s full of jewels and silk, and the magic pearl which is the Imperial family’s heirloom?

Since it’s already been done, I just wish for everyone to get out of my palace.

This story takes place in 1944. Japan is entering a crucial phase in the war against the United States. Cities and towns in Japan fall one after the other under America's continuous bombing. They even get hold off the pacific coast due to their mighty force of 230 submarines, but Japan refuses to admit defeat. They must stop the enemy's advances at all costs. Testings for their new weapon are done - the Kaiten, a suicide torpedo with a built-in cockpit was ready to be mobilized into the battlefield. The time is now perfect for Japan to recruit pilots and station them at a military base on a remote island. Volunteers will forfeit their lives, but recruiters do their patriotic duty: the fate of Japan rests on their shoulders! A fascinating and psychological story on these suicide missions told from the Japanese soldiers' perspective.  
-Mangaupdates

In a world where people suddenly developed super-powers, those who used their abilities to do evil are held at Catastrophe Prison. Shu Ono, a guard at the prison, somehow fell in love with the strongest female prisoner Lava! A crazy love-comedy about the forbidden relationship between guard and prisoner!
description.es-la: Un mundo en el que las personas desarrollan repentinamente habilidades diferentes. Los que utilizan sus habilidades para hacer el mal son encarcelados en una prisión de catastrófica. Shu Ono, que trabaja allí como guardia, se enamora de algún modo de la prisionera más fuerte, ¡Lava!

description.en:
A scout in the infamous Demon Cult, Seolhwi is on a routine patrol when his squad unexpectedly encounters a fearsome master of the Mount Hua Sect, the sworn enemies of the Demon Cult. Without warning, the Mount Hua Cult master slaughters the entire squad. As Seolhwi lies dying, lamenting years of service to the cult with nothing to show for it, he is suddenly faced with a video game prompt, asking if he would like to start again. Given the opportunity to start over and make different choices, Seolhwi vows to survive and become stronger so he can rise to the top of the Demon Cult.

description.ja:
魔教の太皇閣主「司魔鬼（しまき）」の命令で華山派の出没地域に派遣された飛客組。「雪輝（せつき）」は華山派の絶対的実力者である「究種明（きゅうしゅめい）」に殺されそうになるが、そのとき目の前に突然、謎の画面が浮かび上がり任務を受ける直前に戻ってしまう。雪輝は前世で自分が殺される原因となった任務に再び就くことになるが、少しでも周りの環境を変えようと奮闘する。危機に陥るたび目の前に現れる画面、そして結果が全く予想できない選択肢。生と死が共存する世界で最善の方法を見つけて進みつづける。

description.ko:
마교의 태왕각주, ‘사마귀’의 명령에 의해 화산파 출목지역으로 파견나간 비객조. 
주인공 ‘설휘’는 화산파 고수 '구종명'과 맞딱드리고, 죽을 위기에 처하게 된다.
그때 눈앞에 상태창이 나타나 정찰임무를 받기 직전 시점으로 회귀하게 된다. 
설휘는 전생에서 죽임을 당했던 똑같은 정찰임무를 받게되자 이 변하지 않는 현실을 바꾸기 위해 발버둥 친다. 
고비마다 눈앞에 나타나는 선택창.
미래를 알 수 없는 선택들.
삶과 죽음이 공존하는 세상 안에서 최고의 방법을 찾기 위한 설휘의 일대기.

description.ru:
Группа разведчиков была направлена в район секты горы Хуаньшань их великим лидером Мантисом. Главный герой, Соль Хви, сталкивается с Мастером секты Хуаньшань – Гу Чжон Мен и оказывается на грани смерти. Появляется окно статуса, которое возвращает его в то время, когда он ещё не принял роковую миссию. 
Вновь получив этот билет в один конец, Соль Хви изо всех сил пытается изменить свою судьбу. Окно статуса, которое появляется в критические моменты. Выбор с неизвестными последствиями. 
Это история Соль Хви, пытающегося найти лучшее решение, идущего по грани жизни и смерти.

description.tr:
Hua Dağı Mezhebinin bölgesine büyük lider ‘Mantis’ tarafından bir grup izci gönderildi.

Kahraman ‘Seol Hwi’ Hua Mezhebinin ustası ‘Goo Jong Myung’la karşılaşır ve ölümle karşı karşıya gelir.

Daha sonra bir durum penceresi açılır ve keşif görevi verilmeden önceki zamana dönmesini sağlar.

Onu ölüme sürükleyen keşif görevini aldıktan sonra, Seol Hwi kaçınılmaz gerçeği değiştirmek için mücadele eder.

Her krizde ortaya çıkan durum penceresi, geleceği belirsiz seçimler yaptırır.

Seol Hwi yaptığı seçimler ile en iyi kararı bulmaya çalışırken yaşam ve ölümle yüzleşmek zorundadır.
description.zh:

I don’t want to work. I really don’t want to work. But I have no choice.
Problems with Humans, Elves, Orcs, Trolls, Dragons and such alien immigrants never seem to cease.
800 years of disgusted employment. The struggles of a man who will die if he stops working.

title.en: The Terminally Ill Young Master of the Baek Clan

altTitles.en: Baek Clan's Terminally Ill Young Master

description.en: Baek Yigang is a son of the Baek Clan, one of the seven great clans of Zhongyuan. Afflicted with the Taiyin Qi Blockage, he is cursed with a shortened lifespan and the inability to collect internal energy. He had been peacefully spending the rest of his days indoors when he was ambushed by a group of masked people. During the ambush, he lost his servant who was like a sister to him. Chased by the attackers, Baek Yigang escaped through a secret underground path. When he came across a blocked path, he decided he’d at least die fighting and picked up a rusted sword that was stuck in the ground…

"I didn’t marry my wife because I loved her. I just signed a contract with her at her request."
I actually knew the truth, so it’s not his fault. I was the one who developed false expectations. I had spent three years as his wife. and I tried hard to be the right woman for him, but I couldn’t get a piece of his heart.
"I didn’t know it would last this long. It’s annoying."
I was nothing to him to the extent that he all but forgot about me as soon as the heroine appeared. In the end, she was always going to be the main character and I was always going to be an extra. No matter how hard I try, my role isn't changing. So it’s only right for me to leave.
"I’m sorry I’ve been bothering you all this time. Please be happy with her."
description.ko: 아슬란의 아내로 지냈던 3년. 그에게 어울리는 여자가 되려고 무던히 노력했으나, 그의 마음을 얻을 수 없었다. 소설 속 여자 주인공이 나타나자마자 버려질 정도로, 나는 그에게 아무것도 아닌 존재였다. 주인공은 주인공, 엑스트라는 엑스트라. 아무리 애를 써도 나는 고작해야 귀찮은 엑스트라에 불과할 뿐. 그러니까 내가 떠나는 게 맞는 것이다.
description.tr: Siz Aşıkken ben aslında gerçeği biliyordum. “Karımla onu sevdiğim için evlenmedim.” Yani bu onun hatası değildi. Yanlış beklentilere sahip olmak benim hatamdı. “Onunla sadece ihtiyaçlara dayalı bir sözleşme imzaladım.” Karısı olarak üç yıl. Onun için doğru kadın olmak için çok uğraştım ama kalbinden bir parça alamadım. “Bu kadar uzun süreceğini bilmiyordum. Sinir bozucu.” Kadın kahraman ortaya çıkar çıkmaz bir kenara atıldığım ölçüde onun için bir hiçtim. Sonunda, ana karakter ana karakterdi ve figüran da figürandı. Ne kadar uğraşırsam uğraşayım, ben sadece sinir bozucu bir figürandım. Rolüm değişmedi. Bu yüzden ayrılmak benim için doğru. “Bunca zaman seni rahatsız ettiğim için özür dilerim. Lütfen onunla mutlu ol.”

description.en:
Following a momentous battle against giants for the fate of the world, Ronan emerges victorious as the last man standing of the Imperial Army. As he laments this hollow victory with his dying commander, Grand Marshal Adeshan, they quickly learn that the war is far from over and an overwhelming force of giants descends from the heavens.

Fearing the worst, yet seeing hope in the courageous Ronan, Adeshan uses her last time slip to send him back to the past, so that he can enroll in the prestigious Phileon Academy and become the strongest swordsman the empire has ever seen!

Fanpai Da Shixiong, Shimeimen Quan Shi Bing Jiao

altTitles.en: The Big Villain Brother and the Junior Sisters Are All Sick and Delicate
The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**
